annualFeeInitialPeriod.title: Annual Fee Initial Period
annualFeeInitialPeriod.description:
When annual fee is first paid.

Valid enumeration values:

  • 0: Annual fee first paid in period 0
  • 1: Annual fee first paid in period 1
  • -1: Annual fee paid after first year
  • -2: Annual fee paid in period 1 if there is no initial fee; otherwise after year 1 (combination of 1 and -1)
